title: [Large-Scale] Development of Analytical Hierarchical Process-Based Pedagogy for Disaster Response Training Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Disaster Management Theory and Instructional Design Experience
context.additional_context: Designing disaster response training evaluation models leveraging mathematical domain expertise

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three evaluation criteria for disaster response training by applying Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) principles
Learners can select optimal training methods by applying AHP models to real-world scenarios (market/apartment fire cases)
Learners can systematically organize collected expert opinions and propose at least two improvements for training programs

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
